alert.note: Alert for Coleman; Concho; McCulloch (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:34PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Coleman, northwestern McCulloch and northeastern Concho Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 433 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northwest of Doole, moving slowly north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rain could cause ponding of water on roads. Locations impacted include... Ivie Reservoir Near Concho Park Marina, Gouldbusk, Leaday, Stacy, Doole and The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1929 And Ranch Road 2134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
